    • Constructor Detail

      • AKDigit

        public AKDigit(int left,
       int top,
       float th,
       float g,
       Color color)
        Parameters:
        left - Digits x position in parents coordinate
        top - Digits y position in parents coordinate
        th - thickness of the digit-lines segment. actual lines are 4-times thick
        g - gap between digit-lines
        color - Foreground color for the digit

      • AKDigit

        public AKDigit(int left,
       int top,
       float th,
       float g)
        Parameters:
        left - Digits x position in parents coordinate
        top - Digits y position in parents coordinate
        th - thickness of the digit-lines segment. actual lines are 4-times thick
        g - gap between digit-lines
